description:
Every human inhabiting the world of Alcia is branded by a “Count” or a number written on their body. Depending on how each person lives their life, this Count either goes up or down. For Hina’s mother, her total drops to 0 and she’s pulled into the Abyss, never to be seen again. But her mother’s last words send Hina on a quest to find a legendary hero from the Waste War—the fabled Ace!

(Source: Funimation)

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Lost Civilization
tags.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/GODDOOR1967) | [Website](http://www.ne.jp/asahi/sky/road/)

Often goes by one of his many pseudonyms.

__Birthplace:__ Kushiro, Hokkaido, Japan

__[Website](http://junichimatsumoto.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/junichimatsumo4) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/junichimatsumotoof/) | [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/unichiatsumoto/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYZunc5j3EHKSbN-TwAjqGg) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%9D%BE%E6%9C%AC%E6%B7%B3%E4%B8%80)__

Junichi Matsumoto is a composer, arranger and keyboardist. He graduated from Kunitachi College of Music.
Kenta Tsuboi is a background artist.

[Profile (Style Cube)](http://stylecube.jp/talents/miku/index.html) | [Profile (Columbia)](https://columbia.jp/itomiku/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/itou-miku/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/InfoItomiku) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/itomiku_official/) | [LINE](https://page.line.me/itomiku_official) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miku_Itō) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/伊藤美来)

Miku joined the idol unit [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177) on April 27, 2013 and is one half of its subunit, [Pyxis](https://anilist.co/staff/139753), along with [Moe Toyota](https://anilist.co/staff/118398). 

Miku's hobbies include watching anime, dancing, and playing Hyakunin Isshu. She also practices kendo (but is at the lowest level) and enjoys acting. She is a fan of Kamen Rider, and her favorite rider is Den-O.

**Non-anime roles:**
• Fu Xuan - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
• Olivia - Memento Mori (VG)
• Kolulu - Granblue Fantasy (VG)
• Indomitable - Azur Lane (VG)
• Liv - Punishing: Gray Raven (VG)
• Agnès Claudel - Kiseki Series (VG)

[Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=294) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/abbieizumi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/_rina_honnizumi___/)

She debuted in 2013 and graduated from the Tokyo Animation College in March the same year.
Founder and representative director of Otonarium.

__Height:__ 152 cm (5' 0")
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile (I'm Enterprise)](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=31) | [Official Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ari-step/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ari_Ozawa) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E6%BE%A4%E4%BA%9C%E6%9D%8E)

On August 10th, 2020, she announced her marriage to musician [Hige Driver](https://anilist.co/staff/142137).

!~

__Height:__ 159cm
__Nicknames:__ いしずか (Ishizuka), 静様 (Shizuka-sama), (静) 御前 ("Shizuka" Gozen)

[Profile (Ken Production)](https://www.kenproduction.co.jp/talent/8) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/beerlover-shizuka/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shizuka_Itō) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/伊藤静)

She married on December 5, 2012, her 32nd birthday, but later announced her divorce on April 30, 2020.

She was part of the seiyuu unit with [Hitomi Nabatame](https://anilist.co/staff/95184/) called "Hitomi Nabatame to Shizuka Itou" (生天目仁美と伊藤静) under Geneon's cosmic★motion label. Together they are known by the name Hitoshizuku (ひとしずく).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/AlanFernandoV) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/alanfernando.mx/)

A Mexican voice actor. He is best known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Billy in *The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy* and Jim Lake in *Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia*.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/brunosangregorio/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/clayton.sangregorio)

Bruno Sangregório is an actor, dubbing artist, producer, dubbing coordinator and dubbing director, and also a teacher at the DuBrasil Dubbing Course for Actors. He is married to the voice actress [Luana Stteger](https://anilist.co/staff/197329/).

He also acts as a filmmaker, being a director and screenwriter for the company Intra7 Filmes. He is a founding member and collective director of the theatrical group Mídias Conexas.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/guilhermedebarros/)

Guilherme de Barros is a Brazilian actor and voice actor.
